author: mfreedman
msg: Added 2 tests to verify that encodeActionURL of a nonFaces target returns the properly encoded URL in both the default/standard case and the new configuration that asks it to encode the URL as a portlet resource.

author: mfreedman
msg: Added PS6 feature that allows bridge to be configured to encode action URLs to nonFaces targets as portlet resourceURLs rather than as a portlet re nder URL.
